import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Router from 'next/router' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' import servicePath from '../config/apiUrl' import '../static/style/components/header.css' import { Row, Col, Menu, Icon } from 'antd' const Header = () => { const [navArray , setNavArray] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ const fetchData = async ()=>{ const result= await axios(servicePath.getTypeInfo).then( (res)=>{ return res.data.data } ) setNavArray(result) } fetchData() },[]) return (
技术胖 专注前端开发,每年100集免费视频。 首页 视频 生活
) } export default Header
